meta.author: Vic Mortelmans
meta.description: The table exctracts data from multiple linked webpages using user-provided dapper queries. Where url="the starting page" and listdapper="the name of a dapper that parses hyperlinks to datapages" and nextdapper="the name of a dapper that parses the link to the next page" and nextcount="the maximum number of pages that is accessed" and datadapper="the name of a dapper that parses the data the will be returned by the query". Providing nextdapper, nextcount and listdapper is optional.
meta.sampleQuery: use 'http://github.com/vicmortelmans/yql-tables/raw/master/data/deepdapper.xml' as deepdapper; select * from deepdapper where url = "http://developer.yahoo.net/forum/?s=50b9662690d907227e122678bdf36b1c&showforum=41&cookiecheckonly=1" and datadapper = "ydnforumdata" and nextdapper = "ydnforumnext" and listdapper = "ydnforumlist" and nextcount = 2
